name: eBMS-US
0:
”Alexa open fee bee”
”Alexa, ask fee bee to open the blinds slightly”
”Alexa, tell fee bee I am too cold.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fee bee
des:
Welcome to a new age of technology, where you can control and get data for all the devices in your home/office/business with Alexa. This skill offers the opportunity to get a Niagara automation System (if you don't already have one) and control all of your devices including lights, doors, blinds, temperatures, TV, cooling/heating systems... 

To use the core features of this skill you will need:
1. To get licensed with Tyrrell Products
2. A pin number provided by Tyrrell Products after a successfull registration. (this pin will be used to get registered)
3. A Niagara System, configured by Tyrrell Products or any other Niagara/Vykon distributor

Once all of the requirements are met here are some examples of what you can do:

"Alexa, tell fee bee to set my location" - so you can set your echo device location (bedroom, living room ...), but not required
"Alexa, set the temperature to twenty three"
"Alexa, what is the kitchen temperature?"
"Alexa, set the living room lights on"
"Alexa, turn up the blinds"
"Alexa, open the door"
"Alexa, turn the house off"

... Among many other possibilities using our configurable system on Niagara.
Contact us or visit our website to get you started and get your pin !
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
